title: Sessions
custom_preconds:
In Session = App has been launched or foregrounded within 3 hours of last use.
Out of Session = App has been closed or backgrounded > 3 hours.

Killing the app will NOT reset a session

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has launched the app from a dead or backgrounded state within 6 hours of last use
(check from both dead and backgrounded)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be considered in session
And the user is taken to the last view they were on (including webviews)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has launched the app from a dead or backgrounded state after 6 hours have elapsed
(check from both dead and backgrounded)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be considered out of session
And the user will be taken the Ballpark Guide / Ticket Dashboard

title: Location Check
custom_preconds:
We assume the user is out of session for these cases.

Out of Session = App has been closed or backgrounded > 3 hours.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will start the location check
And the user will see the location check on the dropdown

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the location check times out
And the user has location permissions ON
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought to the last team they were on

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the location check fails
And the user has location permissions OFF
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the last team they were on
And the user will receive an alert, 'Please turn location services on.'

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the location check fails
And the user has location permissions OFF
And the user doesn't tap on the location services alert
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will remain on the team page

title: Close Ballpark
custom_preconds:
-User is out of session
-Location Check has succeeded
-User is Close to a ballpark

(Close = < .3 miles from home plate or within beacon range)

default sub tab is determined in the config: http://qa.mlb.com/gen/hb/ballpark/8/ballpark.json
position: "1",  =  default tab

custom_steps_separated.expected:

custom_steps_separated.expected:
